  physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features four women. All of them are sitting down. Some of them are looking at one another while others are looking towards the direction in which the photograph was captured. A large tree can be seen in the background. \u0027Straits born chinawomen\u0027 is stated at the bottom.

  subject_terms_1: group portraits women (female humans) Peranakan folk costume

  subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Women Ethnic costume Peranakan (Asian people) Portraits
 Group

  subject_terms_3: Portrait photography Women Peranakan costumes

  sgcool_label_text: This photograph shows four Peranakan women in baju panjang and batik sarongs seated at the foot of a tree. The caption ‘Straits born chinawomen’ is printed beneath the photograph.
